property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: The Graphical Explorer of GPU Programs (GIG) is used to help debug CUDA programs. It uses the formal verifier GKLEE, developed at the University of Utah, to automatically detect many errors and problems such as race conditions, deadlocks, and bank conflicts. This is all cleanly integrated into an easy-to use eclipse plug-in.
